title: BookMyShow | Movies & Stream
description:
Stay entertained all the time!

Book tickets for movies, concerts, live events, sports, activities, and much more on BookMyShow. Stream live events from the comfort of your home. Buy or rent exclusive titles and watch at home. 

With a presence in over 650 Indian cities and international presence in Indonesia, Singapore, UAE, Sri Lanka, and West Indies, BookMyShow is one of the biggest entertainment destinations. BookMyShow works along with partners across the industry to provide unmatched entertainment experiences to millions of customers.

Safety: Check
With My Safety First tag, know about the safety measures that are taken by your nearest cinemas before booking your tickets.

How to stay entertained at home, though?
With BookMyShow ONLINE, simple!
Experience fun from your favourite, comfy couch! Explore from an array of events from Theatre, Comedy Shows, Music Concerts, Fitness, and so much more. Everything LIVE streamed to your home! So get that yoga mat, or pop that corn and enjoy these amazing shows on BookMyShow ONLINE from the safety of your home.

What’s new?
More entertainment! 

Introducing BookMyShow Stream- Handpicked cinema from around the world. Get personalized recommendations, discover different movies on Premieres, Exclusives, and more. Buy or rent movies in the resolution of your choice, pay per view and watch them on any platform, your phone, TV, or on the website. You can use Airplay to cast on your AppleTV. You can also download a movie and view it later without the internet. Collect the movies you've bought/rented in your Stream library. Enjoy movies in languages like English, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and even French! Login to your Stream account with the BookMyShow app. Express checkout for faster transactions.


What’s more?
So much more!

What can be a better gift than entertainment? With BookMyShow Gift Cards, treat your loved ones with amazing offers on BookMyShow.

Stay up to date on entertainment news with BookMyShow BUZZ. Watch celebrity interview videos, read movie and show reviews, and more.

BookMyShow has always strived to bring world-class live entertainment experiences to India. It made its first foray into international production with the award-winning musical - The King and I, in association with Trafalgar Entertainment Group at the London Palladium. BookMyShow also produced Disney’s Aladdin and the world-renowned Cirque du Soleil. BookMyShow is your go-to app for all kinds of entertainment.

At BookMyShow, we take our users' privacy seriously.
• Storage: We save some data locally to avoid making a lot of network calls.
• Your Location: We use the location data to show you venues around you. No data is saved on our servers.
• Your Social Information: We only need to read your contacts when you need to pick someone from the contacts to share the booking details. We don't save any of this data on our servers, ever.
• Your application’s information [Retrieve running apps] & Logs: We use this to gather the information that helps us fix issues that you may experience with our app. We do not save any of this information.
• Your Accounts: We require this to be able to send Push Notifications. Don’t worry, we never spam.
• Your Contacts: We need access to your contacts so that you can invite your friends to chat or join you after you've booked your tickets. We ask for your contact permission for a bunch of features like chat, sharing tickets with friends. Your information will be kept confidential.
• Read and Receive SMS: We need this permission to enable our app to read your One Time - Password SMS and automatically enter the code while completing the payment. Your privacy will be respected and no information will be saved.

Download our app for FREE and book tickets on the go. The box office is at your fingertips.

Like us on Facebook:- http://www.facebook.com/BookMyShowIN
Follow us on Twitter:- https://twitter.com/BookMyShow
Follow us on Instagram:- https://www.instagram.com/bookmyshowin/

title: blinkit (formerly grofers)
description:
grofers is now Blinkit. We are moving forward as a new company with a new mission: to make commerce faster and more sustainable. 

Everything else remains the same –

For instance, have friends at home and you've run out of snacks? Really want that next packet of chips? Want a chilled coke for those special evenings? Tinder or Bumble date going well? We got your back ;)

Blinkit is India's most loved and therefore, the biggest 10 minute delivery platform. We are bringing the magic of 10 minute delivery to Indians with more than 7,000 products across fruits, vegetables, snacks, groceries, chargers, and many more.

Never stress out about anything going out of stock. If you need it urgently, you get it with Blinkit (formerly grofers).

Save time and stay calm. Be it a cricket match screening, football game, house birthday party, pooja, festivals – you don't have to wait hours and days for your order anymore. Anything you need, from daily groceries to premium chocolates to pet food to emergency needs (including some non-prescription medicines) and much more, Blinkit (formerly grofers) will deliver them to your doorstep in 10 minutes or less.

We are pioneering the quick commerce revolution across India using our industry leading technology and data capabilities.

You can download our easy-to-use app to shop online for groceries, fresh fruits and vegetables procured daily, dairy & bakery, beauty & wellness, personal care, household care, diapers & baby care, pet care, meats, and seafood as well as the latest products from leading brands like Coca-cola, Lays, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Loacker, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, Nestle, Amul, Dabur, and many more.

WHEN SHOULD YOU USE Blinkit
Uninvited guests? Get biscuits and namkeen delivered in 10 minutes
Planning a screening of the cricket match? Get snacks and drinks delivered in 10 minutes
Making a salad at home? Get lettuce, olive oil, seasoning, olives, and more delivered in 10 minutes
TV remote not working? Get batteries delivered in 10 minutes
Making tea and ran out of milk? Get fresh milk delivered in 10 minutes
Craving snacks for your late-night Netflix binge? Get chips and chilled coke delivered in 10 minutes
Need help to get through Monday morning? Get coffee beans or cold brew delivered in 10 minutes
Ran out of diapers at home? Get baby diapers and other products delivered in 10 minutes
Forgot pads at home? Get sanitary pads delivered in 10 minutes
Kids going back to school? Get tiffins, bottles, and more delivered in 10 minutes
Broke your mom's favorite flower pot? Get Feviquick delivered in 10 minutes
Want to set up a Christmas tree at home? Get Christmas trees, decorations and even plum cakes in 10 minutes
Bad headache after a long day? Get Disprin, Saridon, and more delivered in 10 minutes
Ran out of food for your pet? Get Pedigree and more delivered in 10 minutes

SPEED COMES WITH SAFETY
Our delivery partners bring your order with a smile on their faces as their speedy service doesn't come at the cost of safety
We have a wide network of stores, with a store live every 2 kilometers
The average delivery speed for our fleet is 10 kmph due to the efficiency of our systems and in-house technology

CITIES AVAILABLE
10-minute delivery in Agra, Ahmedabad, Allahabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Durgapur, Faridabad, Guwahati, HR-NCR, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Mathura, Meerut, Mohali, Moradabad, Mumbai, Panipat, Pune, Sonipat, UP-NCR, Vadodara

FEEDBACK
Your suggestions are always welcome. Drop us a line at info@blinkit.com

Website: https://blinkit.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/letsblinkit

title: Tinder - Dating & Meet People
description:
With 30 billion matches to date, Tinder® is the world’s most popular app for meeting new people. Think of us as your most dependable wingmate — wherever you go, we’ll be there. If you’re here to meet new people, expand your social network, meet locals when you’re travelling, or just live in the now, you’ve come to the right place. We’re called “the world’s hottest app” for a reason: we spark more than 26 million matches per day. How many dating apps do that?

Match. Chat. Date. Tinder is easy and fun — use the Swipe Right™ feature to like someone, use the Swipe Left™ feature to pass. If someone likes you back, it’s a match! We invented the double opt-in so that 2 people will only match when there’s a mutual interest. No stress. No rejection. Just tap through the profiles you’re interested in, chat online with your matches, and then step away from your phone, meet up in the real world and spark something new.

Now, let’s get started. And remember, when in doubt, give a Swipe Right™. Trust us, the more options you have, the better-looking life becomes. 

Welcome to Tinder — the largest, hottest community of singles in the world. Don’t be shy, come on over.

MORE FEATURES? THAT’S A PLUS

Upgrade to Tinder Plus® for premium features, including unlimited likes, so you can use the Swipe Right feature to your heart’s content; Passport to chat with singles anywhere around the world; Rewind to give someone a second chance; one free Boost per month to be the top profile in your area for 30 minutes; and additional Super Likes to stand out from the crowd.

GET THE GOLD TREATMENT

Upgrade to Tinder Gold™ for a first-class experience: Passport, Rewind, unlimited likes, five Super Likes per day, one Boost per month, and more profile controls. But wait: it gets better. Save time and aimless searching with our Likes You feature, which lets you see who likes you. Think of it as your personal Tinder concierge — available 24/7 — bringing all of your pending matches to you. Now you can sit back, enjoy a fine cocktail and browse through profiles in your own time. Goodbye search fatigue. Hello #GoldLife

-----------------------------------

If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus or Tinder Gold, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. Current Tinder Plus subscription price starts at $9.99 USD/month, and one-month, 6-month and 12-month packages are available. Current Tinder Gold subscription price starts at $14.99 USD/month, and one-month, 6-month and 12-month packages are available. Prices are in US dollars, may vary in countries other than the US and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus or Tinder Gold, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

title: Where is my Train - Confirm
description:
Train Seat Availability - Indian Railway PNR & Train Info is your one stop app for all your Indian Railway and train enquiry. Quickly Check the PNR Status of your Train Tickets Today! Quicker Way to Find पनर, PNR Status, Cleartrip, Railyatri, Indian Railway Enquiry. Lot's Of information regarding PNR, NTES, PNR no, Pnr states, Enquiry, Train Enquiry, spot your train in INDIAN RAILWAYS, PNR Status, Live Train status.

Live running train status, time tables, station status, PNR enquiry, a unique berth & seat calc, and reservation date calc for Indian Railways.
With the help of Train Seat Availability - Indian Railway (using your PNR number), you can find information related to your ticket booking status, coach number of train, a list of the passenger. Using your 10 digit PNR Number, you can get the PNR status details.

Using INDIAN RAILWAYS, PNR Status, Live Train status gets train running status, PNR status, Live train status from Indian Railways Server with great efficiency. In Indian Railway train app Share live status, time tables and trains between two station with dynamic links from the app which will show uptodate information when received.

Train Seat Availability - Indian Railway PNR & Train also includes Train seat availability, status status, train enquiry, indian rail info, fares, train schedules, PNR Status Tracking, railway time table, Train ticket booking and Destination Alarms. Indian Railway PNR & Train has helped millions of Indian Railway Yatris.

Main Feature

PNR STATUS & PREDICTION

- Updated PNR station list
- PNR prediction for waitlisted tickets
- Get PNR status, receive automatic status updates and travel reminders.
- Tweaks to Time Table loading & caching, PNR sharing

TRAIN SEAT AVAILABILITY & BOOKING

- Find information on trains running between any 2 stations including fare and real-time seat availability info.
- Book your Indian Rail tickets directly on Train via the railway apps.

TRAIN RUNNING STATUS WITH ALARMS

- Find Indian Train Coach Position
- Check train running status for all trains anytime, anywhere.
- Share Live Train Status or Location with friends and family

INDIAN RAILWAYS INFORMATION

- Live Train Status, Live Train Time, Running Train Station
- PNR Status & Indian Rail Info, Ticket Bookings
- See train timetable for all Indian rail passenger and express trains.
- Get trains schedules, coaches, pantry, catering and platform information.
- Run a fare enquiry on General, Tatkal and Premium Quota for different indian rail classes 1A, 2A, 3A, CC, SL & more.
- Major Indian rail trains covered: Shatabdi Express, Rajdhani, Duronto Express, Garib Rath, Jan Shatabdi, Inter-city etc.

Other features:

• Train running status live
• Indian Railways Time Table
• Platform Numbers - Find Platform number of your train.Check PNR Status with confirmation chances, Train Status, Seat Availability with confirmation prediction, Train Time Table, train tickets enquiry, etc. 
• PNR Status with Prediction - Get notified about PNR Status change & chart preparation status. 
• Train running status live - Simplest way to check train running status by just providing train number.
• Indian Railways Time Table - Download and access Time Table for offline use.
• Platform Numbers - Find Platform number of your train.
• Seat Availability & Ticket Bookings through Agents - Know seat availability & find out seat confirmation 
• Coach Position - Get information on coach position, seat and berth layout
• Get all the latest Train Seat Availability - Indian Railway news

Disclaimer : Train Seat Availability - Indian Railway PNR & Train Info is not affiliated with Traina, NTES or Indian Railways and there are no warranties associated with the app. Train Seat Availability - Indian Railway app relies on public information available on 3rd party websites.
